results.deck: A 2D side-scrolling shooter developed by Oxeye Game Studio and published by Mojang AB.
results.name: Cobalt

results.deck: Persona 4 Arena is an Arc System Works-developed fighting game with an Atlus-developed story mode that serves as the official sequel to both Persona 3 and Persona 4.
results.name: Persona 4 Arena

results.deck: An air combat game set amidst the biggest battles of World War II.
results.name: Combat Wings: The Great Battles of WWII

results.deck: Onechanbara Z: Kagura is the sequel to D3's Onechanbara: Bikini Samurai Squad. Kagura and Saaya are on a quest to kill the protagonists from the previous game for creating zombies all over the world
results.name: Onechanbara Z: Kagura

results.deck: Dead or Alive 5 is the seventh entry in the Dead or Alive fighting game franchise, introducing a new visual style, new game mechanics, and highly interactive stages.
results.name: Dead or Alive 5

results.deck: 5pb developed and published this visual novel for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
results.name: Dunamis 15

results.deck: Based on the TV series, NCIS has the player investigating mysterious crimes on behalf of the U.S. Navy.
results.name: NCIS

results.deck: SpongeBob's Surf & Skate Roadtrip is a Spongebob game that is based on the episode 'Road Trip' for the Nintendo DS and Xbox 360.
results.name: SpongeBobâ€™s Surf & Skate Roadtrip

results.deck: The latest entry in the Infinity visual novel series.
results.name: code_18

results.deck: Undead Labs' Zombie MMO
results.name: Class4 (working title)

results.deck: Generator Rex: Agent of Providence is a game based on the series of the same name on Cartoon Network.
results.name: Generator Rex: Agent of Providence

results.deck: This slightly budget-priced game is a NASCAR branded Blur knockoff from Activision.
results.name: NASCAR Unleashed

results.deck: A collection of art lessons, drawing tools and minigames designed for use with the uDraw Game Tablet.
results.name: uDraw Studio: Instant Artist

results.deck: Black Bean's rally racing game returns for the 2011 season.
results.name: WRC 2: FIA World Rally Championship

results.deck: Big game hunting comes to the Kinect with the latest Cabela's licensed game, Hunting Party.
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter: Hunting Party

results.deck: A dungeon crawler RPG game set in future Tokyo. Originally released for the PC, it has since been ported to the Xbox 360 and PlayStation Vita.
results.name: Labyrinth Cross Blood

results.deck: Despite sharing the branding of the famous Twister party game, Twister Mania is actually just a passable clone of Hole in the Wall.
results.name: Twister Mania

results.deck: Jillian Michaels' Fitness Adventure is a fitness game for the Xbox 360 that utilizes the Kinect.
results.name: Jillian Michaels' Fitness Adventure

results.deck: Upcoming game for Kinect. A family-friendly game with mini-games.
results.name: Motion Explosion!

results.deck: Dance game for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 that have Kinect and Move support.
results.name: Dance Magic

results.deck: A game show game developed and published by Ubisoft.
results.name: Family Feud 2012 Edition

results.deck: The first game to bear the Jane name in a decade, discarding the realism of the original Jane's Combat Simulation titles.
results.name: JASF: Jane's Advanced Strike Fighters

results.deck: In Sledge Hammer your goal is to avoid other cars that will try and crash you.
results.name: Sledge Hammer

results.deck: Dance and sing to the songs from the classic movie musical Grease in this release for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
results.name: Grease Dance

results.deck: A kid-oriented motion controlled mini-game collection from Cabela's. Players attend summer camp for a week and compete in 8 different camp-style games.
results.name: Cabela's Adventure Camp

results.deck: Kinect game focused on kicking virtual training partners in the gonads.
results.name: Self-Defense Training Camp

results.deck: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron is the spiritual successor to 2010's "War for Cybertron", and depicts the climax of the war between the Autobots and the Decepticons, culminating in the destruction of the Transformer homeworld of Cybertron.
results.name: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron

results.deck: A Marvel themed game for the UDraw tablet.
results.name: Marvel Super Hero Squad: Comic Combat

results.deck: Alvin & The Chipmunks: Chipwrecked is a music game based on the movie of the same name.
results.name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked

results.deck: ABC's TV show about fitness, abuse, and humiliation continues its march across consoles.
results.name: Wipeout 2

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 13 is EA Sports' golf sim for the 2012 season.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 13

results.deck: Let's Cheer! is a cheerleading/dancing game for the Xbox 360 Kinect.
results.name: Let's Cheer!

results.deck: Kinect sporting game for Xbox 360 from Robomondo and Activision.
results.name: Big League Sports

results.deck: A console title based on the popular party game which utilises THQ's uDraw tablet.
results.name: Pictionary: Ultimate Edition

results.deck: A kart racing game featuring fourteen characters from DreamWorks movies.
results.name: DreamWorks Super Star Kartz

results.deck: Released to coincide with, but not based on or tying into Men in Black III, Alien Crisis sees players shooting aliens and saving the world as Peter Delacoeur, a former thief and now an MIB agent.
results.name: Men in Black: Alien Crisis

results.deck: Announced at NYCC 2011, The Amazing Spider-Man game is an original story told after the 2012 movie. The console versions are developed by Beenox, the company that created Shattered Dimensions and Edge of Time while the DS version was developed by Other Ocean Studios.
results.name: The Amazing Spider-Man

results.deck: Kinect game based on the popular game show
results.name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 2012 Edition

results.deck: HD remakes of the first three Devil May Cry games, released this time for PS3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Devil May Cry HD Collection

results.deck: The third game in the Yoostar franchise, focused entirely on MTV programming.
results.name: Yoostar on MTV

results.deck: Rapala comes to Xbox 360 with kinect support. No longer do you have to use any peripheral when catching fish!
results.name: Rapala for Kinect

results.deck: A game with quizzes, puzzle games and have an explorer mode where players compete to claim parts of the world with mini-games.
results.name: National Geographic Challenge!

results.deck: Kinect Rush: A Disney/Pixar Adventure is a game for Kinect in collaboration with Disney and Pixar. The game will scan you into the worlds seen in five of Pixar's movies.
results.name: Kinect Rush: A Disney/Pixar Adventure

results.deck: Grand Theft Auto V is a modern crime epic featuring a crew of three protagonists rolling through the diverse landscape of the fictional state of San Andreas.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto V

results.deck: A budget-priced videogame version of The Price is Right, with the subtitle "Decades" being their excuse for the fact that the virtual prizes being offered are years out of date.
results.name: The Price Is Right: Decades

results.deck: A cancelled entry in Ubisoft's tactical shooter series that would have been about an armed uprising against the US government. The game was succeeded by Rainbow Six: Siege.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow 6: Patriots

results.deck: This sequel to the sci-fi visual novel Muv-Luv has protagonist Takeru Shirogane reliving the events of the previous game. But being aware of what is ahead, he hopes to change things for the better and give humanity a chance against the alien onslaught.
results.name: Muv-Luv Alternative

results.deck: This console collection puts the board games of Family Game Night 2 and 3 onto one disc.
results.name: Family Game Night Fun Pack

results.deck: Nickelodeon Dance is a dance game allowing you to dance with popular characters from Nickelodeon programming; it will be available on both XBox 360 Kinect and Nintendo Wii.
results.name: Nickelodeon Dance

results.deck: When invading aliens capture the Saints and imprison their minds in a digital recreation of Steelport, it's up to the Boss (who by now has become the President of the United States) to free Earth from its oppressive new overlords.
results.name: Saints Row IV

results.deck: Game of Thrones is an action RPG from Atlus and developer Cyanide, featuring a story written under the supervision of series creator George R.R. Martin.
results.name: Game of Thrones

results.deck: Sequel to 2008's LEGO Batman, Batman and Robin are forced to work together alongside the likes of Superman, Wonder Woman and Green Lantern to help stop the combined tyranny of Lex Luthor and The Joker.
results.name: LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes

results.deck: Japanese eroge visual novel featuring five heroines. Consists of two parts: Muv-Luv Extra and Muv-Luv Unlimited. Adult content is not present in 360 and PS3 versions.
results.name: Muv-Luv

results.deck: A WWII shooter from City Interactive and Stuart Black, the creator of Black. It is slated for release on June 10th, 2014.
results.name: Enemy Front

results.deck: Kung-Fu High Impact is a side-scrolling brawler that uses the Kinects body tracking technology to put the players on screen.
results.name: Kung-Fu High Impact

results.deck: Meet your match in this open-city release for PS3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Machi-ing Maker 4

results.deck: An Obsidian-developed role-playing game based on the South Park animated TV series, in which players control a new kid in the eponymous town of South Park and takes part in an epic pretend-fantasy story that threatens the entire town.
results.name: South Park: The Stick of Truth

results.deck: Heavy Fire: Afghanistan is a on-rails arcade shooter set in modern-day Afghanistan. It is the third game in the Teyon's Heavy Fire series, the first at retail.
results.name: Heavy Fire: Afghanistan

results.deck: The third game in the Warriors Orochi series featuring 120 playable characters from a multitude of Tecmo Koei franchises.
results.name: Warriors Orochi 3

results.deck: Codemasters' latest entry into their rally series is an arcade spin-off. Featuring over-the-top demolition, and hoonigan action, as well as race events.
results.name: Dirt Showdown

results.deck: An Xbox 360 exclusive that puts 8 Capcom Arcade titles on one disc.
results.name: Capcom Digital Collection

results.deck: The next installment of 2K's baseball sim.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K12

results.deck: The classic tactical turn-based combat returns in this modern re-imagining of X-COM: UFO Defense.
results.name: XCOM: Enemy Unknown

results.deck: Epic Mickey goes multiplatform in this Disney-published sequel. The game includes co-op in which players can play as Oswald the Lucky Rabbit.
results.name: Disney Epic Mickey 2: The Power of Two

results.deck: A new Zumba Fitness game exclusively for Xbox 360 and Kinect. With more songs, dances and other things.
results.name: Zumba Fitness Rush

results.deck: Test Drive: Ferrari Racing Legends is a driving game featuring scenarios that span the history of Ferrari, from the 1940s to present-day.
results.name: Test Drive: Ferrari Racing Legends

results.deck: Watch special episodes of the long-running children's television series Sesame Street and interact with the Kinect.
results.name: Kinect Sesame Street TV

results.deck: The North Pole is in trouble and only you can save Christmas in ELFSQUAD7! Go solo or team up with family and friends (two-player local for PC, four-player for Xbox Live Indie Games) in this co-op holiday adventure as you wrap toys, stuff Santa's sack, demolish freakish un-toys, and battle Kevin - the haywire toy-building robot of the North. This is retro gaming at its most festive, so ready the milk and cookies...it's time to save Christmas!
results.name: Elfsquad7

results.deck: The technically eighth entry in the popular horror series features the return of leading protagonists Leon S. Kennedy and Chris Redfield, along with new character Jake Muller, to combat against the latest B.O.W. manufacturer Neo-Umbrella.
results.name: Resident Evil 6

results.deck: The latest entry in the DoDonPachi bullet hell series by Cave.
results.name: DoDonPachi Saidaioujou

results.deck: This sequel to Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure introduces new "Giant" Skylanders to the toy-based action series from developer Toys For Bob. All the original Skylanders figures are useable this sequel, with 16 new Skylanders being added as well.
results.name: Skylanders Giants

results.deck: Battleship is a tie-in to the movie of the same name that is loosely based on the board game of the same name. Don't let aliens sink your battleship!
results.name: Battleship

results.deck: Madagascar 3: The Video Game is a game based on the third movie in the Madagascar franchise.
results.name: Madagascar 3: The Video Game

results.deck: Based on the movie of the same name.
results.name: Rise of the Guardians

results.deck: The fifth console entry in the Assassin's Creed franchise. It introduces the half-Native American, half-English Assassin Connor and is set in North America in the late eighteenth century amid the American Revolutionary War.
results.name: Assassin's Creed III

results.deck: Konami is publishing this WWII flight combat game.
results.name: Birds of Steel

results.deck: Deep Silver is publishing this multiplatform look at the Summer Games.
results.name: Summer Stars 2012

results.deck: A sniping-based first-person shooter, developed by Hydravision Entertainment and published by Big Ben Interactive.
results.name: Snipers

results.deck:
Denizen's Den is a dungeon crawler Xbox Live Indie and PC game.

This game was designed for re-playability with it's random levels and items. Even if you win, you will want to play again so that you can use what you unlocked. Flattened Pixel has resurrected the retro from dungeon crawlers.
results.name: Denizen's Den

results.deck: Young Justice: Legacy is a game based on the Young Justice animated cartoon show. It is best known for its long, troubled development cycle.
results.name: Young Justice: Legacy

results.deck: A modern FPS that knits missions 'inspired by real events' into a narrative of shooting dudes in different countries.
results.name: Medal of Honor: Warfighter

results.deck: After two years off (and a cancelled name change), NBA Live was set to return for the 2012-2013 NBA season before it was officially cancelled on September 27, 2012. This marks the third year in a row that EA did not release an NBA simulation game.
results.name: NBA Live 13

results.deck: BandFuse: Rock Legends is a guitar tutor/game featuring Slash.
results.name: BandFuse: Rock Legends

results.deck: Race motorbikes in this licensed release from Black Bean and MileStone.
results.name: MUD: FIM Motocross World Championship

results.deck: A dance game for the Xbox 360 Kinect.
results.name: Country Dance All Stars

results.deck: NCAA Football 13 is EA Sports' college football sim for the 2012 season.
results.name: NCAA Football 13

results.deck: An updated port of Cave's bullet hell shoot 'em up Mushihime-sama. Features new Beginner and Arrange modes, and a port of Mushihime-sama Cave Matsuri Ver 1.5 as DLC.
results.name: Mushihime-sama HD

results.deck: An updated port of G.Rev's Under Defeat.
results.name: Under Defeat HD

results.deck: Forza Horizon takes the racing off the track and drops it into an open world full of various activities.
results.name: Forza Horizon

results.deck: A strategy game from Haemimont Games, the developers of Tropico 3 and 4, in which players build a 1920s-era criminal empire from the ground up.
results.name: Omerta: City of Gangsters

results.deck: An upcoming game set in the world of the cult classic movie
results.name: The Boondock Saints Video Game

results.deck: The official video game of the London Olympic Games, held in Summer 2012.
results.name: London 2012 - The Official Video Game of the Olympic Games

results.deck: A game based on the Pixar animated fantasy movie Brave.
results.name: Disney-Pixar Brave

results.deck: The third annual F1 game from Codemasters.
results.name: F1 2012

results.deck: Madden NFL 13 is Electronic Arts' football sim for the 2012-2013 NFL season.
results.name: Madden NFL 13

results.deck: Solaris Assault Tech is an arena based combat game in which the players pilot MechWarriors based on the BattleTech and MechWarrior franchises. Aimed at being a professional sports-based game,  players will be able to use in-game currency to sponsor and place bounties on other players, upgrade their MechWarriors and buy new equipment.
results.name: Solaris Assault Tech

results.deck: An upcoming RPG based on Brandon Sandersonâ€™s fantasy series Mistborn.
results.name: Mistborn: Birthright

results.deck: Engage in ancient combat with the deadliest of warriors in this 345 Games banger. A remastered compilation of Deadliest Warrior: The Game and Deadliest Warrior: Legends.
results.name: Deadliest Warrior: Ancient Combat

results.deck: The Dream C Club franchise spawns a mahjong game. Finally.
results.name: Mahjong â˜… Dream C Club

results.deck: NHL 13 is the 21st installment in the NHL franchise by EA SPORTS.
results.name: NHL 13
